Service Details: - Offers twice monthly youth group sessions in partnership with Central Okanagan School District Aboriginal Education Program which provides cultural presentations- Topics covered include Cultural Identity, Substance Abuse Prevention, Aboriginal Arts and Crafts, and Self-esteem and Social Skills- Snack provided - Transportation may be provided
Meetings: Usually Friday from 3:00pm - 5:30pm @ Winfield Memorial Hall (10130 Bottom Wood Lake Rd, Lake Country)
